author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two masked men broke open a house, attacked a couple and snatched a 10-sovereign chain from the woman at Ambasamudram on Wednesday.

The two men broke open the main door of the house of retired engineer Palaniappan (70) of R.S. Colony around 1 a.m. When he woke up and saw them breaking open an almirah, he tried to stop them following which the duo attacked him with a sickle and inflicted injuries on his hands.

The duo also assaulted Palaniappan’s wife Velammal and snatched her gold chain weighing 10 sovereigns and fled away. On hearing their screams for help, their neighbours came and rushed the couple to Ambasamudram Government Hospital.
title: House break-in: masked men snatch 10-sovereign chain
